title: Drawing, "Desk: Drop-End,  Built-in Lighting, Telephone, Smoking Accouterments, Waste Paper Drawer", 1930s
medium: Graphite, red color pencil, green color pencil
markings: Stamped in black ink at center right, parallel to right edge, DONALD DESKEY/ ASSOCIATES
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions in graphite throughout. Inscribed in graphite: at upper left:, PHONE, LIGHT; noted four times, DROP END; centered, ASHES & CIGARETTES; at lower left, METAL LINED/ DRAWER FOR/ WASTE PAPER. Inscribed in red color pencil: at upper left, PHONE BOX, PHONE WIRE OUTLET; at lower right, WASTE PAPER/ DRAWER, PHONE/ BOX. Inscribed in green color pencil at lower left, BUZZER

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Desk: Drop-End,  Built-in Lighting, Telephone, Smoking Accouterments, Waste Paper Drawer", 1930s.
1930s. Graphite, red color pencil, green color pencil. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1780.
